name: Restaurant Simulator (Sunset Diner)
description:
Restaurant Simulator (Sunset Diner) is a console game about a restaurant. It aims to recreate the restaurant experience as faithfully as possible. Plus, it's written in pure Python!

FEATURES:
    - waiting for service and food!
    - music and background noise!
    - a variety of items to choose from!
    - a sense of humor!

And best of all, it's free! So what are you waiting for? Download Restaurant Simulator (Sunset Diner) now and enjoy the restaurant experience anytime!

Thanks to Toby Fox for the music (It's Raining Somewhere Else from Undertale).
The fork and knife image is a random stock image from the internet.
